strategies.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Technique
strategies.description: Use your senses to ground yourself in the present moment

strategies.name: Box Breathing
strategies.description: A simple breathing technique to reduce anxiety

strategies.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
strategies.description: Calming breath pattern for anxiety and sleep

strategies.name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
strategies.description: Systematically tense and relax muscle groups
steps: Start with your toes, tense for 5 seconds
Move up to calves, thighs, abdomen

strategies.name: Cold Water Technique
strategies.description: Use cold sensations to interrupt distress
steps: Splash cold water on your face
Or hold ice cubes in your hands

strategies.name: Safe Place Visualization
strategies.description: Imagine a place where you feel completely safe
steps: Close your eyes and breathe deeply
Picture a place where you feel safe
Notice the details - colors, sounds, smells
Stay as long as you need

strategies.name: TIPP Technique
steps: Temperature: Use cold water on face
Intense exercise: Do jumping jacks for 1 minute
Paced breathing: Exhale longer than inhale
Paired muscle relaxation: Tense and release

strategies.name: Stream of Consciousness Writing
strategies.description: Write without stopping to release thoughts
steps: Get paper and pen or open notes app
Don't worry about grammar or making sense
Tear up or delete after if desired

strategies.name: Opposite Action
strategies.description: Act opposite to your emotional urge
steps: If sad and want to isolate - reach out
If angry and want to yell - speak softly

strategies.name: Self-Soothing with Senses
strategies.description: Use your five senses to calm yourself
steps: Vision: Look at photos that make you happy
Smell: Use essential oils or candles
Taste: Drink herbal tea or eat comfort food
Touch: Wrap in a soft blanket or take a warm bath

grounding.name: Grounding Techniques
grounding.description: Bring yourself back to the present moment

breathing.name: Breathing Exercises
breathing.description: Use breath to calm your nervous system

physical.name: Physical Techniques
physical.description: Use your body to release tension
